member.name: M:TransportDirect.Presentation.InteractiveMapping.Query.FindNearestITN(System.Double,System.Double,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
This method returns a QuerySchema Dataset object containing the information of the geometrically nearest ITN feature relative to point x,y.
The 'address' parameter can be zero length.
This method will search outwards for an ITN from point x,y until a positive result is returned. Within this result, if no address has been supplied, then the nearest feature will be returned. If an address has been supplied, then the nearest feature that MATCHES THE ADDRESS will be returned. If an address has been supplied, but no feature matching that address has been found after expanding the search radius the configured number of times, THE NEAREST FEATURE WILL BE RETURNED.
If ignoreMotorways has been set to true, the search radius will be continually increased until a non-motorway ITN is found.
member.param: Double x coordinate to search from
Double y coordinate to search from
String address to search against (can be zero length)
Boolean flag indicating whether Motorways should be included in result set
member.returns: A QuerySchema object containing details for a single ITN
